description: An exception has been made during the Christmas period, with some limitations.
title: Coronavirus: Jersey told to 'stop mixing indoors'
title_page: Coronavirus: Jersey told to 'stop mixing indoors' - BBC News
maintext: He said: "If you must mix with another household you should do so outside in a large space like on the beach, in a park, or in country lanes and always maintain 2m of physical distance at all times.
